text: yadi tumhaara koee bhala hota hai to unhen bura lagata hai. parantu yadi tumhen koee apriy baat pesh aatee hai to usase ve prasann ho jaate hai. yadi tumane dhairy se kaam liya aur (allaah ka) dar rakha, to unakee koee chaal tumhen nuqasaan nahin pahuncha sakatee. jo kuchh ve kar rahe hai, allaah ne use apane dhere mein le rakha hai
